title: Leek and cauliflower soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 leeks, sliced', '1 carrot, sliced', '1 onion, sliced', '1 cauliflower, roughly chopped', '100ml white wine', '1 medium potato, peeled and sliced', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', 'chicken stock to cover (approx. 700ml)', 'salt and pepper to taste']
